Package alethinophidia.userInterface

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Field
    It's an universal class for creating interface elements.
    GameModesMenu
    GameModesMenu class that controls game modes menu that pops up after choosing new game from main menu
    HelpMenu
    Just a simple help screen
    InGameInterface
    Class that controls in-game interface panel, score panel and healthbar
    MainMenu
    Class that controls all Main Menu buttons
    MapChoiceMenu
    The most complex of menus.
    MessageWindow
    Class controls the popup that shows after the game is over
    OptionsMenu
    Controls options menu in game.
    Scoreboard
    Controls scoreboard menu.
